snippet: The trial of Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab, who is accused to trying to blow up a Northwest airliner in 2009 as it prepared to land in Detroit, will begin Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab, who is accused to trying to blow up a Northwest airliner in 2009 as it prepared to land in Detroit, will begin Tuesday.

headline.main: Trial to Start in Attempt to Use Bomb Aboard Jet
headline.print_headline: Trial to Start In Attempt To Use Bomb Aboard Jet
